text: int max1 ( int a , int b ) { if ( a > b ) return a ; else return b ; } int main ( ) { int n , t , i , j , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; if ( n < 1 || n > 1000 ) exit ( 0 ) ; while ( n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; if ( t < 1 || t > 99 ) exit ( 0 ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = t - 1 ; i > 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] = a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] + max1 ( a [ i ] [ j ] , a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
